pages.text: Every wand is made of three parts, $(l:wand_cores)a core$(), $(l:wand_tips)a tip$(), and $(l:wand_handles)a handle$(). Each of these parts contributes different stats to the wand. You may mix and match any combination of these parts to create a new wand, but $(l:wand_presets)certain combos $()have special attributes.
Crafting a Wand starts with a Wand Crafting Bench. You will be given a copy of this book when you craft the bench, but you already know that if you are reading this.
